page.title: 05Royal Air Force Camp Sealand
page.content: I have lived at the camp for two and a half years.My parents lived here before I was born.I was born in Germany,and then came to Sealand.Many other children on the camp were also born in different parts of the world like Cyprus,Malta,Scotland and Germany.No aeroplanes are on the camp now,only gliders.The jobs that people do here are cooks,airpilots,Physical Training Instuctors and engineers.My father tests parts of aeroplane engines.There are many clubs on the camp like the Wives' club,Emu club, Bingo club,Youth club and Keep Fit club.We have a gymnasium,squash courts,play grounds,tennis courts and there is a very large sports field.There is also a glider club,but you have to be a member of the Air Training Corps to take part.They have to be very careful with security.
